long_description: Made of durable, water-resistant materials, this rain cover keeps your CamelBak dry and protected. Quick and easy to use, it has three attachment points, plus a cinch system to ensure a secure fit. Bright yellow provides daytime visibility and includes reflectivity for enhanced low-light visibility. Small/Medium fits the Cloud Walker 18, Fourteener 24, Rim Runner 22, Octane 18X, Flashflo LR, Helena 22 W, Scout, and Trailblazer 15. Small/Medium also fits the Fourteener 20, Pursuit 24 LR M, Day Star 18 W, Spire 24 LR W, Arete 18, Octane 22 LR, Aventura 22 W and Aventura 18 W. Medium/Large fits the Peak Bagger, Isis and Zephyr and other packs between 1700 - 2300 cu. in.
short_description: Made of durable, water-resistant materials, this rain cover keeps your CamelBak dry and protected.
